pmtables 0.0.1.9056
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Add column split spanner information to st object

st_span_split.Rd

See the span_split argument to stable().

st_span_split(x, sep, ...)

Arguments

x

an stobject
sep

passed to colsplit()
...

passed to colsplit()

Examples

library(dplyr)

file <- system.file("datasets", "with-dots.RDS", package = "pmtables")

data <- readRDS(file)

st_new(data) %>% st_span_split('.') %>% st_make()
#>  [1] "{\\def\\arraystretch{1.4}\\tabcolsep=5pt"                                                               
#>  [2] "\\begin{threeparttable}"                                                                                
#>  [3] "\\begin{tabular}[h]{lllllll}"

#>  [5] "\\multicolumn{1}{c}{} & \\multicolumn{3}{c}{\\textbf{Normal}} & \\multicolumn{3}{c}{\\textbf{ESRD}}\\\\"
#>  [6] "\\cmidrule(lr){2-4}"                                                                                    
#>  [7] "\\cmidrule(lr){5-7}"                                                                                    
#>  [8] "STUDY & WT & CRCL & ALB & WT & CRCL & ALB \\\\"                                                         
#>  [9] "\\hline"
